body_html: @arassadin , Could you please post the contents of linker script gen_trt_engine_op_py_wrappers_cc-2.params. If you are using normal compiler commands from command-line, -lcudnn would work. But bazel uses sandboxed compilation and may (will) try to avoid libraries from system. Also notice that -lcudnn is not in your command line.

body: @arassadin , Could you please post the contents of linker script `gen_trt_engine_op_py_wrappers_cc-2.params`. If you are using normal compiler commands from command-line, -lcudnn would work. But bazel uses sandboxed compilation and may (will) try to avoid libraries from system. Also notice that -lcudnn is *not* in your command line.
